data.text: This is the word of the LORD that came to Micah the Moreshite in the days of Jotham, Ahaz, and Hezekiah, kings of Judahâ€”what he saw regarding Samaria and Jerusalem:
Hear, O peoples, all of you;
For behold, the LORD comes forth
The mountains will melt beneath Him,
All this is for the transgression of Jacob
All her carved images will be smashed to pieces;
Because of this I will lament and wail;
Do not tell it in Gath;1:10 Gath sounds like the Hebrew for tell. do not weep at all.
For the dwellers of Maroth 1:12 Maroth sounds like the Hebrew for bitter. pined for good,
Therefore, send farewell gifts 1:14 Or give dowry to Moresheth-gath;1:14 Moresheth sounds like the Hebrew for gift or dowry.
I will again bring a conqueror against you,
Shave yourselves bald and cut off your hair
